mapper.insert: insert into data_property_access (app_key,model_id, property_id, grant_target_id, grant_target_type, tenant, access_type, status, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{appKey},#{modelId}, #{propertyId}, #{grantTargetId}, #{grantTargetType}, #{tenant}, #{accessType}, #{status}, now(), now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY update status=#{status},access_type=#{accessType},gmt_modified = now()

insert into data_property_access (app_key, model_id, property_id, grant_target_id, grant_target_type, tenant ,access_type, status, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) values
(#{item.appKey},#{item.modelId}, #{item.propertyId}, #{item.grantTargetId}, #{item.grantTargetType}, #{item.tenant}, #{item.accessType},#{item.status}, now(), now())
ON DUPLICATE KEY update status=values(status),access_type=values(accessType),gmt_modified = now()
